select c.id as id, c.canvas_name as canvas_name,c.describe_info as describe_info, c.upload_time as upload_time, d.thumbnail_url,c.number from (select a.id as id, a.canvas_name as canvas_name,a.describe_info as describe_info,b.upload_time as upload_time, b.number as number from canvas_info as a left join (SELECT canvas_info_id_private, max(upload_time) as upload_time, COUNT(1) as number from material_info where create_user_id= #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY canvas_info_id_private) as b on a.id=b.canvas_info_id_private where a.is_valid=1 and user_id =#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) as c left join material_info d on c.upload_time = d.upload_time
